description.value:
One of your ancestors paid the ultimate price for her beliefs. This distant relative martyred herself out of her devout belief in a cause, and that sacrifice echoed down to her descendants, infusing them with arcane power. Your bloodline confers abilities that allow you to endure pain, resist torture, and inspire others.

Class Skill: Perform (oratory).

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{Endure Elements} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c81jnlmi4976g7sz]{Surmount Affliction} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{Heroism} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.scyklgov72pvw884]{Blessing Of Fervor} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{Heroism, Greater} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2ip53auf03bqxkl1]{Joyful Rapture} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{Mind Blank} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{Overwhelming Presence} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Diehard},

  • Heroic Recovery,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{Leadership},

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Perform),

Bloodline Arcana: Whenever you take damage in battle, your effective caster level increases by 1 during your next turn. This effect does not apply more than once per round.
